description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The fastest turtle in the world is back, and he's bringing 3 friends!  Engage in intense 4 player action as you try to work together to progress through levels, while trying to outdo each other's high scores!  An all new game with upgraded graphics, new levels and for the first time ever, Hurdle Turtle swims!
